findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized user to upgrade scripts, potentially leading to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of sundae tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected initializer
findings.description: The initializer function can be called multiple times, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The 'transfer' function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potentially leading to security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to execute it.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to increase the allowance of an address.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is not protected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is unprotected and can be exploited to mint tokens without authorization.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is not protected and can be accessed internally.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The internal function _beforeTokenTransfer is not protected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected startSwapFunctionality function
findings.description: The startSwapFunctionality function is public and can be called by anyone without any access control.

findings.title: Unprotected deliver function
findings.description: The 'deliver' function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeAccount function
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function is public and can be called by anyone, allowing an attacker to exclude any account from fees.

findings.title: Unprotected includeAccount function
findings.description: The includeAccount function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker to manipulate account information.

findings.title: Unprotected swapAndLiquify function
findings.description: The private function 'swapAndLiquify' is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected swapTokensForEth function
findings.description: The swapTokensForEth function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected addLiquidity function
findings.description: The addLiquidity function lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to manipulate liquidity.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferStandard function
findings.description: The _transferStandard function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferToExcluded function
findings.description: The _transferToExcluded function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferFromExcluded function
findings.description: The _transferFromExcluded function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferBothExcluded function
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function
findings.description: The setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to the contract's state.

findings.title: Unprotected _reflectFee function
findings.description: The _reflectFee function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _reflectBurn function
findings.description: The _reflectBurn function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _takeLiquidity function
findings.description: The private function _takeLiquidity has no access modifier restrictions, making it potentially accessible by unauthorized users.
